settings.heading: Our hand-made leather goods were born to become exquisite – minimalist, highly functional pieces for travel and work that last the distance. They represent quality, durability, and functionality with modern design to provide you with effortless luxury.

settings.text: Share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, make announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

Values, traditions and ideas motivate us to move forward, today we are rapidly developing, expanding, improving and modernizing. New equipment and the use of high-grade materials make it possible to create more complex and functional goods. We make them “all-purpose” — for everyone, but unique. We care about functionality and order, think over various important little things and details, so that each garment plays its own role becoming a part of a personal history.

Leather is not just leather. It has many sides and moods speaking through its age. Texture filled with wrinkles, flaws making it unique, each detail has its meaning. We love how leather plays in different shapes, so we try to reveal its character by pushing nature to new experiments.

We never try to change it, just add more protection with a special treatment to make it water-repellent and resistant to scratches and environmental factors. Zippers, carabiners, buttons, straps — the whole is formed from parts. We spend a lot of time seeking every little thing, so pay attention to the significance of every detail in a particular department of our product. After all, even one detail can make our bag or wallet more comfortable.

settings.title: Mickey
settings.text: Sleek and soft leather to emphasize its natural appearance

settings.title: Nappa
settings.text: Thick and extremely durable leather with a solid color

settings.title: Prague
settings.text: Textured embossed leather that is amazingly soft and pleasant to the touch

settings.title: We use three types of leather
